title: In cases where carpet area occupied by residential tenement in the existing building is less than the carpet area of 27
clause_text: In cases where carpet area occupied by residential tenement in the existing building is less than the carpet area of 27.87 sq.m. then such tenement shall be entitled for minimum carpet area of 27.87 sq.m. and difference of these areas shall be allowed as additional FSI without any premium.
section: (3) 7.6.1 (3) Redevelopment of Multi-Dwelling Buildings of Co-Operative Housing Societies / Apartments

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
